abstract: Trying to avoid taking British government bailout money, the bank is testing the market with buildings in London, Paris and New York.
snippet: Trying to avoid taking British government bailout money, the bank is testing the market with buildings in London, Paris and New York.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings may sell three of its signature office buildings, including its world headquarters at Canary Wharf in London, to raise cash as it tries to avoid a bailout from the British government.

headline.main: HSBC May Put Headquarters and Other Buildings on Block
headline.print_headline: HSBC May Put Headquarters And Other Buildings on Block
